_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Hytale
author: support@hytale.com
description: Hytale is a blocky sandbox game with procedurally-generated worlds. This egg runs a dedicated Hytale server with Java 25 support.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Hytale Installation Script
set -e

apt update
apt install -y curl unzip jq

cd /mnt/server

echo "----------------------------------------"
echo "Hytale Server Installation"
echo "----------------------------------------"

# Download Hytale Downloader
if [ ! -f "hytale-downloader" ]; then
    echo "Downloading Hytale Downloader..."
    curl -fsSL https://downloader.hytale.com/hytale-downloader.zip -o hytale-downloader.zip
    
    if [ ! -f "hytale-downloader.zip" ] || [ ! -s "hytale-downloader.zip" ]; then
        echo "ERROR: Failed to download hytale-downloader.zip"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    echo "Extracting Hytale Downloader..."
    unzip -q -o hytale-downloader.zip
    
    # Find the downloader executable (check multiple possible names)
    if [ -f "hytale-downloader" ]; then
        chmod +x hytale-downloader
        echo "Found hytale-downloader"
    elif [ -f "hytale-downloader-linux" ]; then
        mv hytale-downloader-linux hytale-downloader
        chmod +x hytale-downloader
        echo "Found and renamed hytale-downloader-linux"
    elif [ -f "hytale-downloader-linux-amd64" ]; then
        mv hytale-downloader-linux-amd64 hytale-downloader
        chmod +x hytale-downloader
        echo "Found and renamed hytale-downloader-linux-amd64"
    elif [ -f "hytale-downloader-linux-arm64" ]; then
        mv hytale-downloader-linux-arm64 hytale-downloader
        chmod +x hytale-downloader
        echo "Found and renamed hytale-downloader-linux-arm64"
    else
        echo "ERROR: hytale-downloader executable not found after extraction"
        echo "Contents of directory:"
        ls -la
        exit 1
    fi
    
    rm -f hytale-downloader.zip
    echo "Hytale Downloader ready"
fi

# Verify downloader exists and is executable
if [ ! -x "hytale-downloader" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: hytale-downloader is not executable"
    ls -la hytale-downloader
    exit 1
fi

# Download Server Files
if [ "${AUTO_DOWNLOAD}" == "1" ]; then
    echo "Downloading Hytale Server files (patchline: ${PATCHLINE})..."
    echo "NOTE: This requires a valid Hytale license and OAuth authentication."
    echo "If you see an authentication URL, you must visit it and authorize."
    echo ""
    
    ./hytale-downloader -download-path game.zip -patchline ${PATCHLINE} || {
        echo ""
        echo "========================================"
        echo "  DOWNLOAD FAILED - AUTHENTICATION REQUIRED"
        echo "========================================"
        echo "The Hytale Downloader requires OAuth authentication."
        echo "You must have a valid Hytale license to download server files."
        echo ""
        echo "Alternative installation methods:"
        echo ""
        echo "1. Copy from Hytale Launcher installation:"
        echo "   Windows: %appdata%\\Hytale\\install\\release\\package\\game\\latest"
        echo "   Copy Server/ folder contents and Assets.zip"
        echo ""
        echo "2. Manual download with authentication:"
        echo "   - Download: https://downloader.hytale.com/hytale-downloader.zip"
        echo "   - Extract and run on your PC"
        echo "   - Authenticate when prompted"
        echo "   - Run: ./hytale-downloader -download-path game.zip"
        echo "   - Upload files to server via SFTP"
        echo ""
        echo "3. Set AUTO_DOWNLOAD=0 and upload manually"
        echo "========================================"
        exit 1
    }
    
    if [ ! -f "game.zip" ] || [ ! -s "game.zip" ]; then
        echo "ERROR: game.zip not found or empty after download"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    echo "Extracting server files..."
    unzip -q -o game.zip
    
    # Move files to correct location
    if [ -d "Server" ]; then
        echo "Moving Server files to root..."
        mv Server/* . 2>/dev/null || true
        rm -rf Server
    fi
    
    # Verify critical files exist
    if [ ! -f "HytaleServer.jar" ]; then
        echo "ERROR: HytaleServer.jar not found after extraction"
        ls -la
        exit 1
    fi
    
    if [ ! -f "Assets.zip" ]; then
        echo "WARNING: Assets.zip not found. Server may fail to start."
    fi
    
    rm -f game.zip
    echo "Server files installed successfully!"
    echo "Files installed:"
    ls -lh HytaleServer.jar Assets.zip 2>/dev/null || ls -lh HytaleServer.jar
else
    echo "========================================"
    echo "  MANUAL INSTALLATION REQUIRED"
    echo "========================================"
    echo ""
    echo "Hytale Downloader requires OAuth authentication which"
    echo "cannot be completed during automated installation."
    echo ""
    echo "Please follow these steps:"
    echo ""
    echo "1. On your PC, download Hytale Downloader:"
    echo "   https://downloader.hytale.com/hytale-downloader.zip"
    echo ""
    echo "2. Extract and run the downloader:"
    echo "   Windows: hytale-downloader-windows-amd64.exe"
    echo "   Linux: ./hytale-downloader-linux-amd64"
    echo ""
    echo "3. Authenticate when prompted (OAuth device flow)"
    echo ""
    echo "4. Download files:"
    echo "   ./hytale-downloader -download-path game.zip"
    echo ""
    echo "5. Extract game.zip and locate these files:"
    echo "   - Server/HytaleServer.jar"
    echo "   - Assets.zip (in root of zip)"
    echo "   - (optional) Server/HytaleServer.aot"
    echo ""
    echo "6. Upload files to this server via SFTP/File Manager:"
    echo "   Path: /home/container/"
    echo ""
    echo "Alternative: Copy from Hytale Launcher installation:"
    echo "   Windows: %appdata%\\Hytale\\install\\release\\package\\game\\latest"
    echo "   Linux: \$XDG_DATA_HOME/Hytale/install/release/package/game/latest"
    echo ""
    echo "========================================"
fi

echo ""
echo "----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation Complete!"
echo "----------------------------------------"
echo ""
echo "NEXT STEPS:"
echo "1. Upload server files (see instructions above)"
echo "2. Start the server"
echo "3. Authenticate: /auth login device"
echo "4. Visit URL and enter code"
echo "5. Server will start accepting connections"
echo ""
echo "Note: Limit of 100 servers per Hytale license"
echo "----------------------------------------"

variables.name: Server Memory
variables.description: The amount of RAM allocated to the server in MB. Recommended minimum: 4096MB (4GB). Increase based on player count and view distance.

variables.name: Assets Path
variables.description: Path to the Assets.zip file. Default: Assets.zip in server root directory.

variables.name: Additional Arguments
variables.description: Additional startup arguments for the server. Example: --disable-sentry --backup --backup-frequency 60

variables.name: Auto Download
variables.description: Automatically download server files using Hytale Downloader. Requires Hytale license and OAuth authentication during installation.

variables.name: Patchline
variables.description: Game version channel to download. Options: release, pre-release
